page.title: 19HOUSING SURVEY
page.content: Class 3A conducted a survey at school and asked most of the children about the type of house they lived in. The categories used were as follows : Bungalow,flat,semi detached house, detached house,semi detached cottage, detached cottage,terraced or'town house,mobile home and 'other',eg semi detached bungalow.The results were : {Bungalow 20 9.01% {Flat 9 4.05% {Semi detached house 85 38.29% {Detached house 54 24.32% {Semi detached cottage 7 3.15% {Detached cottage 6 2.70% {Terraced or 'town' house 36 16.22% {Mobile home 1 0.45% {Other housing 4 1.81% {___ { 222 {___}
